plot: Private Gifford Tyler, a young Army enlisted man, decides that he can make a little extra cash running a babysitting service on post, much to the consternation of the base commander, who also happens to be his father.
title: Rockabye the Infantry
plot_es: Private Gifford Tyler, a young Army enlisted man, decides that he can make a little extra cash running a babysitting service on post, much to the consternation of the base commander, who also happens to be his father.
plot_en: Private Gifford Tyler, a young Army enlisted man, decides that he can make a little extra cash running a babysitting service on post, much to the consternation of the base commander, who also happens to be his father.
